title: Instructional Design Strategies to Improve Online Science Learning Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Elementary-Level Science Curriculum in a Smartphone-Centric, Resource-Limited Tech Environment (Most Learners Lack PCs; Unstable Internet Access). Formative Assessments Monitor Learning Outcomes Continuously

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic science concepts with over 80% accuracy on an online LMS platform
Learners perform self-directed learning activities three or more times per week using smartphone-based learning tools
Learners achieve over 70% participation rates in interactions with peer learners via online community features

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
